sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORD_ID AS B5C_ORD_NO ,DATE_FORMAT(SYS_REG_DTTM,"%Y%m%d") AS SYS_REG_DTTM ,CUST_ID AS CUST_ID ,DLV_MODE_CD AS DLV_MODE_CD ,DATE_FORMAT(SYS_REG_DTTM,"%Y%m%d") AS ORD_ESTM_DT ,'N000590200' AS STD_XCHR_KIND_CD , USD_XCHR_AMT AS STD_XCHR_AMT , RMB_XCHR_AMT AS RMB_XCHR_AMT
,(SELECT SUM(ORD_GUDS_QTY * ORD_GUDS_SALE_PRC) FROM tb_ms_ord_guds_opt X WHERE A.CUST_ID = X.CUST_ID AND A.ORD_ID = X.ORD_ID) AS ORD_SUM_AMT
, A.ESTM_RCP_REQ_DT AS ORD_HOPE_ARVL_DT
FROM tb_ms_ord A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ms_xchr B ON xchr_std_dt = period_add(date_format(now(), "%Y%m"), -1)
WHERE A.ORD_ID NOT IN ( SELECT B5C_ORD_NO FROM sms_ms_ord )

SELECT A.ORD_ID AS B5C_ORD_NO , B.ORD_ID AS ORD_ID , B.SLLR_ID AS BRND_ID , B.GUDS_OPT_ID AS GUDS_OPT_ID , B.ORD_GUDS_QTY AS ORD_GUDS_QTY , B.ORD_GUDS_SALE_PRC AS ORD_GUDS_SALE_PRC , C.GUDS_OPT_UPC_ID AS GUDS_OPT_UPC_ID , C.GUDS_OPT_ORG_PRC AS GUDS_OPT_ORG_PRC , D.GUDS_NM AS GUDS_NM , D.GUDS_CNS_NM AS GUDS_CNS_NM , D.GUDS_VAT_RFND_YN AS GUDS_VAT_RFND_YN , F.BRND_STR_NM AS BRND_STR_NM , F.BRND_STR_ENG_NM AS BRND_STR_ENG_NM , C.GUDS_ID AS GUDS_ID_OF_B5M , A.CUST_ID AS CUST_ID FROM tb_ms_ord A , tb_ms_ord_guds_opt B , tb_ms_guds_opt C , tb_ms_guds D , tb_ms_brnd_str F WHERE 1=1 AND A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.ORD_ID = B.ORD_ID AND B.SLLR_ID = C.SLLR_ID AND B.GUDS_ID = C.GUDS_ID AND B.GUDS_OPT_ID = C.GUDS_OPT_ID AND C.SLLR_ID = D.SLLR_ID AND C.GUDS_ID = D.GUDS_ID AND D.SLLR_ID = F.SLLR_ID AND B.ORD_ID NOT IN ( SELECT X.B5C_ORD_NO FROM sms_ms_ord X , sms_ms_ord_guds Y WHERE X.ORD_NO = Y.ORD_NO )

SELECT A.ORD_ID AS B5C_ORD_NO , B.ORD_ID AS ORD_ID , B.SLLR_ID AS BRND_ID , B.GUDS_OPT_ID AS GUDS_OPT_ID , B.ORD_GUDS_QTY AS ORD_GUDS_QTY , B.ORD_GUDS_SALE_PRC AS ORD_GUDS_SALE_PRC , C.GUDS_OPT_UPC_ID AS GUDS_OPT_UPC_ID , C.GUDS_OPT_ORG_PRC AS GUDS_OPT_ORG_PRC , D.GUDS_NM AS GUDS_NM , D.GUDS_CNS_NM AS GUDS_CNS_NM , D.GUDS_VAT_RFND_YN AS GUDS_VAT_RFND_YN , F.BRND_STR_NM AS BRND_STR_NM , F.BRND_STR_ENG_NM AS BRND_STR_ENG_NM , C.GUDS_ID AS GUDS_ID_OF_B5M , A.CUST_ID AS CUST_ID , A.DLV_MODE_CD AS DLV_MODE_CD , D.GUDS_DLVC_DESN_VAL_5 AS GUDS_DLVC_DESN_VAL_5 FROM tb_ms_ord A , tb_ms_ord_guds_opt B , tb_ms_guds_opt C , tb_ms_guds D , tb_ms_brnd_str F WHERE 1=1 AND A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.ORD_ID = B.ORD_ID AND B.SLLR_ID = C.SLLR_ID AND B.GUDS_ID = C.GUDS_ID AND B.GUDS_OPT_ID = C.GUDS_OPT_ID AND C.SLLR_ID = D.SLLR_ID AND C.GUDS_ID = D.GUDS_ID AND D.SLLR_ID = F.SLLR_ID AND B.ORD_ID = #b5cOrdNo#
